page.title: 19FARM STUDY-IVY HOUSE FARM 4
page.content: Mr Willis is concerned about the effects of{farming}on the{enviroment} and because of this he has not cut down the old hedges on the land:his smallest field is just over 1 hectare. He uses mainly organic fertiliser at the rate of 63 tonnes per hectare and a little artificial at 1 tonne per hectare.He is also interested in{ {conservation}and has made two small plantations and two pond.There are moorhens and herons among other birds on the ponds.Mr Willis and his wife have 1 labourer in part time{ {employment}daily jobs of feeding, milking,and mucking out.Mr Willis does not think there will be any big changes at the farm but his wife sometimes tells him to sell up because he has to work so hard for the money he makes.
